name: api_animation_AnimationEvent
description: AnimationEvent lets you call a script function similar to SendMessage as part of playing back an animation.

properties.name: animationState
properties.description: The animation state that fired this event (Read Only).

properties.name: animatorClipInfo
properties.description: The animator clip info related to this event (Read Only).

properties.name: animatorStateInfo
properties.description: The animator state info related to this event (Read Only).

properties.name: floatParameter
properties.description: Float parameter that is stored in the event and will be sent to the function.

properties.name: functionName
properties.description: The name of the function that will be called.

properties.name: intParameter
properties.description: Int parameter that is stored in the event and will be sent to the function.

properties.name: isFiredByAnimator
properties.description: Returns true if this Animation event has been fired by an Animator component.

properties.name: isFiredByLegacy
properties.description: Returns true if this Animation event has been fired by an Animation component.

properties.name: objectReferenceParameter
properties.description: Object reference parameter that is stored in the event and will be sent to the function.

properties.name: stringParameter
properties.description: String parameter that is stored in the event and will be sent to the function.

properties.name: time
properties.description: The time at which the event will be fired off.
